statements: SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT transaction_id, block_number, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE from_address = '0x1234567890abcdef'
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE to_address <> '0x9876543210fedcba' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT block_number, transaction_hash, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY block_number ASC
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number = 100;
SELECT transaction_id, from_address, to_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, block_number, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE to_address = '0x123456789';
SELECT transaction_id, from_address, to_address FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT block_number, COUNT(*) as transaction_count FROM blockchain_transactions GROUP BY block_number HAVING transaction_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number = 100
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address = '0x123456789'
SELECT block_number, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM blockchain_transactions GROUP BY block_number
SELECT * FROM audit_trail WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number = 1000;
SELECT * FROM audit_trail WHERE action = 'transfer' AND user_id = 12345 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, block_number, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address = '0xABCDEF';
SELECT transaction_hash, timestamp, user_id FROM blockchain_transactions JOIN audit_trail ON blockchain_transactions.transaction_id = audit_trail.transaction_id ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_amount FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address = 'Alice';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address='0x123abc' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.sender_address, a.auditor_name FROM blockchain_transactions t JOIN transaction_audit a ON t.transaction_id = a.transaction_id;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_amount, c.comment_text FROM blockchain_transactions t LEFT JOIN transaction_comments c ON t.transaction_id = c.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number = 100;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address = '0x12345678';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number = 100;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT block_number, block_timestamp FROM block_history WHERE block_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY block_timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_status, transaction_timestamp FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_status = 'failed';
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE action_performed = 'update' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT block_number, sender_address, receiver_address, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT block_id, prev_block_id, block_hash, timestamp FROM block_headers WHERE miner_address = '0xabc123';
SELECT audit_id, transaction_id, block_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_trail WHERE action = 'transfer';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number = 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT block_number, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM blockchain_transactions GROUP BY block_number HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY block_number ASC;
SELECT bt.sender_address, bh.miner_address, bt.amount FROM blockchain_transactions bt JOIN block_headers bh ON bt.block_number = bh.block_id WHERE bt.amount < 5000 ORDER BY bt.timestamp DESC;
SELECT a.address, a.balance, bt.amount FROM addresses a JOIN blockchain_transactions bt ON a.address = bt.sender_address WHERE a.balance < 1000 ORDER BY a.address ASC;
